评论详情: I got my CJO in this dress! I got it in navy blue. I got a small size and it was not too tight because I am not curvy at all and am 5’5 125 pounds. It is great for a flight attendant interview, I’d say it’s true to size. I usually wear an XS or S.

Dress fit was perfect. Material is not see through but has some stretch. Good for winter, sleeves come down to elbows. Good value, dress style is conservative but can be form fitting if you want. True to what's pictured. True to size, doesn't look cheap.
I get so many compliments on this dress! The emerald color is gorgeous and it's very classy and professional.
The material is perfect it’s not thin or to thick I have it in 2 different color I am a 14/16 i ordered a 2xl

I am so glad that I ordered this dress. The orange color was perfect (and my favorite one) and it fit like a glove. Price wasn’t too bad and so glad it did not have pockets. I plan on matching it with cognac accessories to bring out the color more. It serves its purpose with covering the stomach area if that is one of your problem spots.
The  Navy bleu dress looked perfect on me. The xl was tight on me, but I was still able to wear it for an event. I weight 200 lbs.
Love the color and the color is as on picture!!Size is true fit.Very classy and comfortable!!Will buy in different colors!!Bought this dress for Family pictures!!Perfect for our color scheme

Love this dress! Dubbed the Flight Attendant ‘CJO’ dress by many flight attendant hopefuls. I decided to change up my normal black suit for this dress for my FA face to face interview. I felt amazing wearing this dress. It gave me the confidence boost I needed. I finally landed my CJO for my dream airline, wearing this dress. Note: many recruiters have seen this dress a lot in multiple colors, so add some of your own personality to the look. I added a light blue handbag for a pop of color. The material is stretchy and not see through. The attached tie/scarf can be worn down or tied into a bow. The length is perfect for a FA interview.  I also wore this dress all day long, while working my customer experience flight during training. It was very comfortable. I am 5’4” 115 lbs. I ordered a size small. I was probably around 125 lbs for my interview. I highly recommend this dress for any job interview or for any office job. It is very professional looking.
Loved the stretch.. nice fit, looks classy
I love the fabric and the style of the dress. I have gained some weight lately but still felt comfortable in it. It was flattering, even with this 20#.
Excellent.... Get this now you won't be disappointed trust me
Fix perfect
Landed a flight attendant job at my dream airline. Extremely flattering and comfortable. Professional and well made. Lots of compliments. I'm 5'4 and 142 lbs. Wearing a size S.

Loved this dress on. I ordered a size up to a medium since i wore it to church and it was a perfect fit. Not too big and not too tight. Length was a little I passed the knees and that was perfect. Would definitely purchase again in a different color.
The fabric is so cheap and thin
Beautiful fit!

I loved this dress! Wore it to a huge interview and felt very professional. I am 5'6, average build and about 135 pounds. The medium fit great. It fits snug/fitted so I'm glad I didn't size down. The fabric is thick(ish) and any wrinkles from packaging vanished after a few minutes in the dryer. I got SO many compliments. The green is beautiful and rich in color. Will probably buy another color! Get this dress!

This dress was perfect for a work event, I sat a lot and it didn’t wrinkle. Fit is very flattering. I did have to size up to a L (for reference, I’m 5’6, 160 lbs and smaller in chest area). This dress is very versatile as it works for any occasion- dressy or casual.

This dress is for sure to turn heads. I ordered an XL (160 lbs) , because of church, but could've gotten a large. Good material,  ease of zipper, and good price. The bow seemed to not want to stay tied.
I have this dress in two colors. I love the it fits. Fits true to size.
This dress is very flattering.  A bit disappointed with the fabric.
This dress is absolutely awesome.  Wash and wear.  No iron.  Makes you look slim. Looks more expensive than what it cost.  Love the 3/4 sleeves. If you need a dress, stop now and buy this!!!!!

Form fitting, but not too tight that it isn't office friendly. Wore to a funeral, as well. It's a great versatile dress!

Great material, true to size, give professional look.  Purchased for a job interview (last minute), and loved everything from the feel of the material (stretchy), great fit, and reasonably priced!

I purchased a size bigger in a different color. I sized  down to my regular dress size and fits beautifully. This dress in the rust red is classic and elegant, yet the color makes it pop.  I have a business cocktail party and this dress will still read professional, but it is a stand out. I’m wearing with chanel two tone slingbacks and a leopard handbag. Love this dress!!!
Dress is flattering for everybody type. Great color, great fit! I received so many compliments every time I wear it. Just brought another color!

This dress is a perfect fit. I ordered a smaller size which was a bit smaller than I would prefer. I reordered and I’m quite satisfied. I’ll be wearing this dress to a wedding.

Es identico a la descripcion, tiene un color muy lindo, el modelo es elegance y las costuras tienen un buen acabado, esto era lo que más me preocupaba antes de decidirme a comprarlo, porque muchas veces vemos un diseño hermoso y cuando lo recibimos las costura y la tela son horribles, este no es el caso. No se transparenta, pueden usarlo sin temor.Tiene buena calidad y lo recomiendo. Ahora explico por qué no le doy Cinco estrellas, es caluroso, tienes que estar en aire acondicionado para usarlo, porque si vas a estar en algún lugar al aire libre te vas a asar por el calor que da la tela. Se ajusta al cuerpo de tal forma que para retirarlo pasas un poco de trabajo. Yo Mido 5.3 y peso 157 lbs, pedi una talla M y como ven en las fotos me queda bien, pero...con una talla L pienso estaria un poquito más cómoda. Depende de si les gusta ajustado o más suelto. Espero les guíe un poco la descricion y por favor publiquen fotos donde pongan su size y altura real, todas las mujeres somos bellas, si publicamos estos datos ayudamos a que otras chicas tengan una idea de lo que van a comprar.
Beautiful  true to size
Wore this to an event. Super cute on if you have the right body type. The material is stretchy but comfortable.
Ordered a 2x perfect for my day of advocacy in DC. Did wear a spank. Great material,  zipper worked great, slimming look.
Very flattering and comfortable dress. Received many compliments throughout the night and also felt good in it.

I’m 5’3, 165, usually wear a large so that’s what I bought but it’s a little baggy. Not sure if the medium would have been too tight though. Overall I’m pleased!

beautiful dress to be polyester. looks very classy on! bought the green and I love it!

I purchased this as a sleek dress for work. My job requires a lot of public speaking so I like to look my best. This dress is the perfect balance of sexy and sophistication. It hugs your curves but with the ruching, high neckline and longer sleeves, it’s work appropriate. I love the detail of the color. The dress is well constructed. I dozed up to a large and I’m glad I did because it is fitted. My only complaint is the scratchiness and thinness of the fabric. It remains to be seen how this will perform after washing and drying it.

The dress fits very nice and shows all the curves. The material is light and doesn't feel heavy. I wore this dress with Temps in lower 60' and it was very comfortable. Closed zipper gives the dress a clean smooth look. Beautiful burgundy color for early fall. I am 186 lbs and very curvy.  I purchased a Large. Hit right below the knee which was great for a conservative wear for church. I purchased the enmeral green but have not tried it on. Will update afterwards. Based in the type of material the price wasn't valued at the cost. Perhaps $25.00-$30.00 would be a better value. But overall, the dress is well made and will likely last as a wardrobe piece.
